definition: of or relating to receding, a hymn that is sung at the end of a service as the clergy and choir withdraw
details:
adjective
- of or relating to receding
noun
- a hymn that is sung at the end of a service as the clergy and choir withdraw
= example: a hymn that is sung at the end of a service as the clergy and choir withdraw
- the withdrawal of the clergy and choir from the chancel to the vestry at the end of a church service
= synonyms: recession
